name: Lair (itch)
description:
Lair was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37 for the theme "One Room"

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=124161

LAIR

You are a beholder just minding your own business, tending to your seal

Pesky adventurers keep coming to your lair to slay you and take your hard earned treasure. You should probably slay them...

At the end of each level you will get to choose a new eye thus growing your power!

Defend you Lair as long as you can!

Credits:
Code - Cory Swanson
Art - Cory Swanson, Dimitri Porcelli, Nick Ditzler
Sound - Cory Swanson, Nick Ditzler

Made With:
- Unity (c#)
- Gimp
- GraphicsGale
- Sunvox
- Audacity
- Caffeine
